The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "carrier mobility" (referring to the movement of charge carriers in a material)
* "J sc values" (referring to the charge carrier mobility in a specific material)

The valid entities that refer to material properties are:

* "hole mobility" (referring to the movement of holes in a material)
